mapper.select: SELECT * FROM modular m WHERE m.mid IN (SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(r.`rJurisdiction`,',',b.help_topic_id+1),',',-1) AS rootid FROM role r LEFT JOIN mysql.help_topic b ON b.help_topic_id < (LENGTH(r.`rJurisdiction`)-LENGTH(REPLACE(r.`rJurisdiction`,',',''))+1) WHERE r.`rid`=${rid})
SELECT r.rid AS MID,r.rname AS mname,r.rJurisdiction AS murl FROM role r
